programme.title: Pearl Harbour and church attendance
programme.short_synopsis: Were the Japanese peace envoys sent to the US during Pearl Harbour being used as decoys?
programme.medium_synopsis: The Japanese peace envoys visiting the White House during the Pearl Harbour attacks, the use of Biblical language by modern-day Americans and the fall in church attendance.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
